flavorText: In all its forms, the forest is the elves' best protector.

foreignData.name: Dornenschild
foreignData.text:
Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +1/+1.
Opfere den Dornenschild: Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +3/+3 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

name: Briar Shield
originalText:
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Sacrifice Briar Shield: Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

rulings.text: When you cast Briar Shield’s activated ability, Briar Shield is put into the graveyard as a cost. The +1/+1 effect immediately ends, but the +3/+3 effect won’t begin until the ability resolves. The enchanted creature gets no bonus while Briar Shield’s ability is on the stack. If its toughness is 0 during this time, it’ll be put into the graveyard.

text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Sacrifice Briar Shield: Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
